Chap. 2 - Teach the Word


                  Washington, D.C., July 24, 1904. 
To Our Leading Physicians:-- 
     Dear Fellow Workers: I am awakened at eleven o'clock. The representations passing before me are so vivid that I can not sleep. The word of the Lord has come to me that there is a decided work to be done in warning our medical missionaries against the dangers and perils that surround them.
